question: What geographical features in the Gangotri Glacier region were named after Atal Bihari Vajpayee, whose anniversary is observed on December 25<sup>th</sup>?
explanation: In October 2018, 4 peaks in the Gangotri glacier region were named after Atal Bihar Vajpayee as Atal 1, Atal 2, Atal 3 and Atal 4. The birth anniversary of Vajpayee is observed on December 25<sup>th</sup> every year and is considered as Good Governance Day.
